titles.title: FAST VETS Act
Focused Assistance and Skills Training for Veterans’ Employment and Transition Success Act
FAST VETS Act
Focused Assistance and Skills Training for Veterans’ Employment and Transition Success Act
FAST VETS Act
Focused Assistance and Skills Training for Veterans’ Employment and Transition Success Act
FAST VETS Act
Focused Assistance and Skills Training for Veterans’ Employment and Transition Success Act
FAST VETS Act

To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify the conditions under which the Secretary of Veterans Affairs is required to redevelop the individualized vocational rehabilitation plan for a veteran, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. H. Rept. 119-266.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 222.

action.text: Mr. Bost moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4446.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

committee.name: House Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
